overview: He has a degree in Communications with a concentration in Marketing from Hult International Business School. Ivor has previously been responsible for the online marketing strategy for the recruitment company ‘Terra Firma Associates’, with a particular focus in social media, as well being the Marketing and Content Manager for the online start-up ‘Student Money Saver’. Also, working as a digital marketer for a number of early-stage startups alongside our CEO which gave him the required experience for heading Swogo’s Marketing and Advertising efforts.
